subject: Track and Field
Steroids
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The I.A.A.F. raced Monday to support Maurice Greene, a four-time Olympic medal winner, after he disputed a report that he had used performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The I.A.A.F. raced Monday to support Maurice Greene, a four-time Olympic medal winner, after he disputed a report that he had used performance-enhancing drugs.
